record.description: One of these girls will be queen at the University of Chicago's 44th annual inter-fraternity Thanksgiving Ball [which takes place] Wednesday night in the Edgewater Beach Hotel. The winner will not be revealed until a few moments before her presentation. Taken at Ida Noyes Hall on the Midway, where judging was held. First row, left to right: Sarah Anne Morgan, Janet Robin, Tamar Simon, Kay Glickman, and Janet Stewart; second row: Sallie Carlisle, Noreen Novick, Barbara J. Smulski, Margaret M. Lynn, and Lennie Dinius.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
